nodes.text: Volpai were a species that existed in the galaxy. Tiggs Leo was a member of this species.
Volpai had multiple eyes and four arms. They were rather skinny with yellow skin with violet stripes.
On Coruscant, a bartender named Tiggs Leo was a member of this species. Another Volpai could be found at Plop Dribble's on the planet Stobar.
